author.name: Sameer Srivastava
author.title: 🇮🇳Chief Operating Officer(COO) & Chief Information Security Officer(CISO) at Anant Raj Cloud Pvt. Ltd.| Business Leader | Technology Advisor | Strategic Policy Advisor| Ex-PwC |Ex-Deputy Director, UIDAI (Aadhaar)🇮🇳Chief Operating Officer(COO) & Chief Information Security Officer(CISO) at Anant Raj Cloud Pvt. Ltd.| Business Leader | Technology Advisor | Strategic Policy Advisor| Ex-PwC |Ex-Deputy Director, UIDAI (Aadhaar)

content: 📢 𝐋𝐢𝐧𝐤𝐞𝐝𝐈𝐧 𝐏𝐨𝐥𝐥 🌟𝑻𝒉𝒆 𝑵𝒆𝒙𝒕 𝑨𝑰 𝑹𝒆𝒗𝒐𝒍𝒖𝒕𝒊𝒐𝒏 𝒊𝒔 𝑯𝒆𝒓𝒆! - Artificial Intelligence is evolving beyond 𝘴𝘪𝘯𝘨𝘭𝘦-𝘮𝘰𝘥𝘢𝘭 𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘤𝘦𝘴𝘴𝘪𝘯𝘨. 𝐌𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐢𝐦𝐨𝐝𝐚𝐥 𝐀𝐈 is transforming industries by integrating 𝒕𝒆𝒙𝒕, 𝒊𝒎𝒂𝒈𝒆𝒔, 𝒂𝒖𝒅𝒊𝒐, 𝒂𝒏𝒅 𝒔𝒆𝒏𝒔𝒐𝒓 𝒅𝒂𝒕𝒂 into one intelligent system—creating 𝐬𝐦𝐚𝐫𝐭𝐞𝐫, more 𝐜𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐱𝐭-𝐚𝐰𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐭𝐞𝐜𝐡𝐧𝐨𝐥𝐨𝐠𝐲.But that’s just the beginning! My upcoming 𝘓𝘪𝘯𝘬𝘦𝘥𝘐𝘯 𝘯𝘦𝘸𝘴𝘭𝘦𝘵𝘵𝘦𝘳 dives deep into 𝘏𝘰𝘸 𝘮𝘶𝘭𝘵𝘪𝘮𝘰𝘥𝘢𝘭 𝘈𝘐 𝘪𝘴 𝘳𝘦𝘴𝘩𝘢𝘱𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘪𝘯𝘥𝘶𝘴𝘵𝘳𝘪𝘦𝘴, 𝘴𝘰𝘭𝘷𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘳𝘦𝘢𝘭-𝘸𝘰𝘳𝘭𝘥 𝘤𝘩𝘢𝘭𝘭𝘦𝘯𝘨𝘦𝘴, 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘶𝘯𝘭𝘰𝘤𝘬𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘯𝘦𝘸 𝘱𝘰𝘴𝘴𝘪𝘣𝘪𝘭𝘪𝘵𝘪𝘦𝘴..🔥 Stay tuned for the latest edition of my newsletter "𝑻𝒉𝒊𝒏𝒈𝒔 𝑻𝒉𝒂𝒕 𝑴𝒂𝒕𝒕𝒆𝒓 𝒘𝒊𝒕𝒉 𝑺𝒂𝒎𝒆𝒆𝒓"—coming soon! 🔥🔔Subscribe the Newsletter on LinkedIn: https://lnkd.in/gZ-68gpX💬 Do take part in the below 📢 𝐏𝐨𝐥𝐥 on the power of Multimodal AI👇 Drop your thoughts in the comments! hashtag#AI hashtag#ArtificialIntelligence hashtag#MultimodalAI hashtag#TechInnovation hashtag#FutureOfAI
